item.title: a loaf of bread
item.description: It is hard, stale and disgusting.
item.appearance: a moldy loaf of bread is lying here.

item.title: a dull practice sword
item.description: The sword is so tarnished and worn that it is barely shiny.
item.appearance: a battered-looking sword lies at your feet.

item.title: a tattered cotton shirt
item.description: The shirt is filthy and offers little protection from the elements.
item.appearance: a crumpled pile of cloth lies here.

item.title: a small bag
item.description: The bag is small and lightweight.
item.appearance: a small bag has been discarded here.
